sentences.sContent: However, the next king of Prussia, Frederick William I.
sentences.sCn: 然而，下一位普鲁士国王，腓特烈威廉一世。

sentences.sContent: However, the next King of Prussia, Frederick William I, to whom the amber room belonged, decided not to keep it.
sentences.sCn: 然而，下一位普鲁士国王，腓特烈·威廉一世，这个琥珀屋的主人却决定不要它了。

sentences.sContent: The Great Elector, Frederick William I, adopted a similar course when he encouraged the French Huguenots to emigrate to Brandenburg-Prussia.
sentences.sCn: 伟大的选候腓得列威廉一世在鼓励法国的新教徒移居普鲁士的布兰登堡时采取类似的手法。

trans.tranCn: 腓特烈•威廉一世（普鲁士国王）
